subject: Public Speaking
title: Cognitive Load Theory
description: A short lesson to help you apply Cognitive Load Theory.

hook.text: The brain can process about 4 chunks of new information at once.

buildup.text: Overload the brain and everything gets dropped.

discovery.text: Simple slides, short sentences, and clear structure reduce load.

climax.text: Reduce cognitive load and your message actually lands.

quiz.question: What is cognitive load?
options: Brain's limited capacity for new information
